item.title: Racing Robot
item.description: Autonomous toy racing car. CAMaleon team at the Toulouse Robot Race 2017. Humbavision team at IronCar. Medium article: https://medium.com/@araffin/autonomous-racing-robot-with-an-arduino-a-raspberry-pi-and-a-pi-camera-3e72819e1e63 Video of the car: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhI71ZdSh6k
